result.name: PTSD Associated Symptoms and the Percent of Trafficked Women Ranking These Symptoms as Severe

row1.item: Feeling as though the event is happening again

row9.item: Feeling irritable, having outbursts of anger

row10.item: Avoiding activities that remind them of the traumatic or hurtful event

row11.item: Inability to remember part or most of traumatic or hurtful event

row13.item: Feeling as if you didnt have a future

row14.item: Avoiding thoughts or feelings associated with the traumatic events

row15.item: Sudden emotional or physical reaction when reminded of the most hurtful or traumatic events (Zimmerman et al., 2006)
